trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Kiishel Ja is short of hands and would like to borrow yours.
TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_TODO_00<tab>Use Kiishel Ja's hammer to obtain chunks of azure crystal.
TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_TODO_01<tab>Deliver Kiishel Ja's hammer and the chunks of azure crystal to Kiishel Ja.
TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_000<tab>You look like you're not afraid of a little manual labor.
TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_001<tab>We need azure crystals from Cenote Neyozzote, but our usual helpers are busy reforming the city.

TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_002<tab>Regardless of what the city does, we've still got najool to grow. I'll lend you my hammer, so if you can go and break me two chunks of azure crystal, I'd be much obliged.

TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_003<tab>You'll find the crystals we need by the trees of living light. Oh, and don't even <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> about losing my hammer. It's worth more than you are.
TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_004<tab>Did you find the crystals? And I'll be taking my hammer back, please.
TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_005<tab>Perfect. Putting these crystals in our reservoir enhances the water's energies, resulting in sweeter najool.
TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_006<tab>Incidentally, enhanced water also makes the peels glow brighter. Could be the tree of living light's influence.
TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_007<tab>Outsiders can find the glowing peels unnerving, but they do you no harm. We've been eating najool for centuries without any adverse effects.

TEXT_KINGZD107_05106_KIISHELJA_000_008<tab>What's on the inside is more important than appearances anyway. And so long as we have little else to eat, my najool had better be as delicious as they come.
